createCommands: npx create-react-app myapp && cd myapp && npm start
folderStructure:
myapp/
├── public/
│   ├── index.html
│   └── favicon.ico
├── src/
│   ├── App.js
│   ├── index.js
│   └── components/
└── package.json
quickstart:
1. Run the create command
2. Open in VS Code
3. Install extensions
4. Start developing
